## JwtService.createToken() method

Create a token (consumed by [JwtService.createAccessAndRefreshToken()](./clm-core.jwtservice.createaccessandrefreshtoken.md)<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createToken(payload: TokenPayload, expiration?: string | number, secret?: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  payload | [TokenPayload](./clm-core.tokenpayload.md) | [TokenPayload](./clm-core.tokenpayload.md) |
|  expiration | string \| number | <i>(Optional)</i> Expiration of the token |
|  secret | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Secret to create signature for token |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

The token to be used by the client to authenticate a specific user against REST services
